description:
* Based on an RPG strategy game developed and published by http://anidb.net/cr46697 [Happy Elements].
In a world where humans and monsters co-exist, a http://anidb.net/ch97308 [boy apprentice] with the power to heal those who clash, embarks on a journey to restore the memories of his friend http://anidb.net/ch97307 [Merc], a girl trapped in a bottle.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Yuu is a young boy who is a Healer, a special magic user who can calm the hearts of angry monsters. Merc is a young fairy creature who lives in a bottle. They`re about to set out on a journey with Mr. Fluffball, a small fluffball creature, in this relaxing and easygoing adventure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der mutlose Junge und das Mädchen in der Flasche
Le garçon trouillard et la jeune fille en pot
Mukiryoku Shounen to Bin no Naka no Shoujo
The Apathetic Boy and the Girl in a Bottle
無気力少年と瓶の中の少女

REGULAR.description:
The crew sets off! It`s a wide world full of adventure, and first up it`s off to the village of the animal people, where a princess is being forced into a marriage she wants no part in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der König der Morgendämmerung und die gefangene Braut
Le roi de l`aube et la mariée captive
The King of Dawn and the Imprisoned Bride
Yoake no Ou to Toraware no Hanayome
夜明けの王と囚われの花嫁

REGULAR.description:
The party arrives at the land of the fairies, where they`re transformed into miniature versions of themselves. But even though they`re small, there`s big trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die burschikose Fee und der Frühling fressende Drache - Teil 1
La fée garçonne et le dragon dévoreur de printemps
Otenba Yousei to Haru o Taberu Ryuu (Zenpen)
The Tomboy Fairy and the Spring-Eating Dragon (Part 1)
おてんば妖精と春を食べる竜(前編)

REGULAR.description:
The group travels to meet the spring-eating dragon. In the process, they learn more about the forest and the fairy country.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die burschikose Fee und der Frühling fressende Drache - Teil 2
La fée garçonne et le dragon dévoreur de printemps (partie 2)
Otenba Yousei to Haru o Taberu Ryuu (Kouhen)
The Tomboy Fairy and the Spring-Eating Dragon (Part 2)
おてんば妖精と春を食べる竜(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Yuu and his friends come to a small village where a princess is cursed. They try to help her break the curse and make her free.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akaki Magatsuboshi to Yuuen no Kousou
La vile étoile pourpre et la foi embrasée
Roter Unheilsstern und der strahlende Chef der sanften Flammen
The Red Star of Evil and the Brilliant Ruler of Superior Flame
紅き禍つ星と優焔の煌宗

REGULAR.description:
A girl gets lost in the mysterious world of dreams, as Yuu travels to the land of hte dead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Traumbegleiter und die Stadt des Vergessens – Teil 1
The Lord with You in Dreams and the Town of Oblivion (Part 1)
Toi au gré de mes rêves et la ville de l`oubli (première partie)
Yume Zoi no Kimi to Boukyaku no Machi (Zenpen)
夢添いの君と忘却の町(前編)

REGULAR.description:
Yuu is trapped in the land of dreams, where he begins to remember his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Traumbegleiter und die Stadt des Vergessens – Teil 2
The Lord with You in Dreams and the Town of Oblivion (Part 2)
Toi au gré de mes rêves et la ville de l`oubli (deuxième partie)
Yume Zoi no Kimi to Boukyaku no Machi (Kouhen)
夢添いの君と忘却の町(後編)

REGULAR.description:
The party comes to the land of birds, where one`s status is decided by the beauty of their singing voice. There, they meet a young girl from the countryside who wants to a diva more than anything...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der König der Gesangswelt und die Diva im Vogelkäfig – Teil 1
Kagakudan no Ou to Torikago no Diva (Zenpen)
Le roi chanteur et la diva en cage (1re partie)
The King of the Song Altar and the Diva in a Cage (Part 1)
歌楽壇の王と鳥籠のディーヴァ(前編)

REGULAR.description:
A new Diva has been born, and the old one has lost her voice. Now a creature beneath the city begins to stir...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der König der Gesangswelt und die Diva im Vogelkäfig – Teil 2
Kagakudan no Ou to Torikago no Diva (Kouhen)
Le roi chanteur et la diva en cage (2e partie)
The King of the Song Altar and the Diva in a Cage (Part 2)
歌楽壇の王と鳥籠のディーヴァ(後編)

REGULAR.description:
The wagon is traveling down the road when it`s attacked by flying monsters, and Yuu and Merc are picked up and carried into the sky! There they land on a floating continent, whose inhabitants are less than friendly...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Engel, der nicht fliegen kann, und die heiligen Flügel der tausend Gebete – Teil 1
L`ange ne sachant voler et les ailes aux mille prières (1re partie)
The Angel Who Couldn`t Fly and the Holy Wings of Ten Thousand Prayers (Part 1)
Tobenai Tenshi to Banki no Seiyoku (Zenpen)
飛べない天使と万祈の聖翼(前編)

REGULAR.description:
Yuu goes to rescue Merc from the floating continent. Along the way, he and his new friend are captured by the palace guard, who have less than benevolent intentions...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Engel, der nicht fliegen kann, und die heiligen Flügel der tausend Gebete – Teil 2
L`ange ne sachant voler et les ailes aux mille prières (2e partie)
The Angel Who Couldn`t Fly and the Holy Wings of Ten Thousand Prayers (Part 2)
Tobenai Tenshi to Banki no Seiyoku (Kouhen)
飛べない天使と万祈の聖翼(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Merc and Yuu are back home after their long journey.  Merc thinks that Yuu was mad he spent so much time away from home, but Yuu has a special present for her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Heiler und die Freundin in der Flasche
L`apaiseur et son amie en bocal
The Healer and the Friend in the Bottle
Yujutsushi to Bin no Naka no Tomodachi
癒術士と瓶の中の友人
Opening
Ending

WIKIPEDIA_JP: メルクストーリア_-_癒術士と鈴のしらべ_-

titles.title: Merc Storia: Mukiryoku Shounen to Bin no Naka no Shoujo
Merc Storia: The Apathetic Boy and the Girl in a Bottle
メルクストーリア -無気力少年と瓶の中の少女-
梅露可物语 -无精打采的少年与瓶中少女-
메르크 스토리아: 무기력 소년과 병속의 소녀
Merc Storia – Mukiryoku Shounen to Bin no Naka no Shoujo
